message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.CR, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with appearance-based person re-identification in video surveillance systems, which involves computer vision and machine learning techniques. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also mentions unsupervised learning, which falls under cs.MM (Multimedia). The use of supervised learning and ranking functions suggests the involvement of machine learning, which is covered by cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also deals with security and privacy concerns in surveillance systems, which falls under cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Finally, the paper involves information retrieval techniques to match people across non-overlapping camera views, which is covered by cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
